properties.areaDesc: Ontonagon to Upper Entrance of Portage Canal MI; Black River To Ontonagon MI; Saxon Harbor WI to Black River MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 7 at 9:53PM EST until January 8 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Heavy Freezing Spray Warning, heavy freezing
spray at a rate of 2 cm per hour or greater occurring, and may
rapidly accumulate on vessels. For the Gale Warning, northwest
winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and waves 6 to 8 feet
occurring. For the Small Craft Advisory, northwest winds 10 to
20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and waves 5 to 8 feet expected.

* WHERE...Saxon Harbor WI to Black River MI, Black River to
Ontonagon MI and Ontonagon to Upper Entrance of Portage Canal
MI.

* WHEN...For the Heavy Freezing Spray Warning, until 10 AM EST
/9 AM CST/ Wednesday. For the Gale Warning, until 1 AM EST
/midnight CST/ Wednesday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 1
AM EST /midnight CST/ to 1 PM EST /noon CST/ Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Operating a vessel in heavy freezing spray is
hazardous. Freezing spray may render mechanical and electronic
components inoperative. Rapid ice accretion on decks and
superstructures may result in a catastrophic loss of stability.
Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could capsize or
damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare for dangerous accumulation of ice on
their vessel. If possible, remain in port, avoid the warning area
or conduct mitigation.

Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST /MIDNIGHT CST/ WEDNESDAY... ...HEAVY FREEZING SPRAY WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ WEDNESDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM EST /MIDNIGHT CST/ TO 1 PM EST /NOON CST/ WEDNESDAY
